TEXT: The applicant is a NORP national , born in DATE and living in NORP . The respondent Government are represented by Mr. P.A. Laptev , representative of GPE at ORG .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the parties , may be summarised as follows .
In DATE the applicant was involved in negotiations to buy part of a house from a third party .

In DATE the applicant brought a court action in connection with a contract which had been prepared during the negotiations . On DATE the ORG granted her claim . The judgment was not challenged and it acquired legal force on DATE .

On DATE , pursuant to a “ protest ” ( application for supervisory review ) by the President of ORG of GPE - GPE , the Presidium of ORG - GPE quashed the judgment and remitted the case to the first instance , indicating that ORG had failed to observe the necessary procedural formalities . The applicant was present on that occasion .
On DATE the applicant ’s claim was dismissed by ORG . On DATE ORG - GPE upheld the decision given on DATE .
An application for supervisory review was rejected by ORG on DATE .
Code of Civil Procedure as in force at the relevant time
Article CARDINAL
“ Judgments , court rulings and decrees which have entered into force , may be reviewed by way of supervision following a “ protest ” lodged by the persons listed in LAW ” .
Article CARDINAL
“ The persons competent to lodge a protest are :
the Prosecutor General - against judgments , orders , and decisions of any court ;
the chairman of ORG - against resolutions of the ORG of ORG as well as against judgments and orders of ORG acting as a court of first instance ;
Deputies of the General Prosecutor - against judgments , orders , and decisions of any court with the exception of the resolutions of the Presidium of ORG ;
Deputies of the President of ORG - against orders and judgments of ORG acting as a court of first instance ;

the chairman of ORG of an autonomous republic , area , regional , or city court , court of autonomous region , and court of an autonomous district , the Prosecutor of an autonomous republic , area , region city , autonomous region , and autonomous district - against judgements and orders of district ( city ) people ’s courts and orders of ORG Cases of respectively ORG of an autonomous republic , area , regional , city court , court of an autonomous region , and court of an autonomous district that reviewed the case according to an appellate procedure ” .
Article CARDINAL

“ The persons listed in LAW are entitled , subject to certain conditions , to obtain the case file in a civil case in order to establish whether there are any grounds for lodging a “ protest ” by way of a supervisory review ” .
Article CARDINAL

“ Officials who are entitled to lodge “ protests ” in accordance with the supervisory procedure may suspend execution of the judgments , orders , and decisions concerned until the supervisory review proceedings are completed ” .
LAW
“ The court which carries out the supervisory review may annul the judgment in whole or in part and remit the case to the first or appeal instance for fresh consideration ” .
